title: Rays Power Infra gets projects worth Rs 833 cr in June qtr
description: Rays Power Infra secured new projects worth Rs 833 crore in the first quarter of the current fiscal, adding over 680 MW to its existing portfolio. The company's commitment to delivering high-quality projects and maintaining growth momentum is evident, as stated by Whole-Time Director Pawan Sharma.
